questions.question: Which of the following is not a step in using incremental development to create a prototype workspace?
options: Save the workspace after testing a section, then test the next section.
Test each section immediately after it is completed.
Create a custom transformer to improve the testing process.
Plan your project as a series of small sections, each of which would fit inside a bookmark in FME.

questions.question: Which transformer can you use to create a subset of data to use when prototyping?
Which of the following is a problem that can be addressed by using a version control system?
options: Poor performance when conducting complex calculations on big data
Getting rejected features when trying to buffer data without geometry
Output data not matching desired schema
Tracking down when problems emerged in a workspace is difficult because there is no record of what has changed and when

questions.question: Why might you use Continue Translation mode for the Rejected Feature Handling parameter?
options: You assume rejections are happening because of bad data and don't want to use those records.
You want to pick and choose which transformers' <Rejected> ports you care about.
You want to verify all your data is correct.
